FuncDef:
The organization-unit command configures the department name for a PKI entity.
The undo organization-unit command restores the default setting. The organization-unit command configures the department name for a PKI entity. The undo organization-unit command restores the default setting. Specifies the department name for a PKI entity.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the department name for a PKI entity.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. The characters can be letters, integers, apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), brackets (), plus sign (+), comma (,), minus sign (-), dot (.), slash (/), colon (:), and spaces.
